name: John HOLLAWELL, Appellant v. William WARD, Secretary, Pennsylvania Board of Probation Parole, Appellee

parties: John HOLLAWELL, Appellant v. William WARD, Secretary, Pennsylvania Board of Probation Parole, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 24th day of July, 2003, probable jurisdiction is noted and the order appealed is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
834 A.2d 486
John HOLLAWELL, Appellant v. William WARD, Secretary, Pennsylvania Board of Probation Parole, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 24, 2003.
